about-me.title: Why me
about-me.text: I'm a passionate coder with a structured approach, loving the endless possibilities of programming. As a lifelong learner and rational thinker, I constantly seek knowledge and self-improvement. My analytical skills and planning help me grow personally. I'm a loyal partner and honest communicator, while solving life's (coding) challenges

references.title2: Here what my colleagues said about me
references.text1: Stephi had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. She is a reliable and friendly person
